name: npc_dota_hero_witch_doctor
bio_loc: A wiry silhouette hitches forward--uneven of feature and limb, bizarre of gait, relentlessly criss-crossing the battlefield in search of that vital weak point where his talents can do most good, and most harm. Whether broken or mismade it is not clear, but still, none can doubt the power carried in his twisted physique. A long staff thumps the earth as Zharvakko the Witch Doctor advances, deploying a terrifying arsenal of fetishes, hexes and spells.  It is a body of magical knowledge learned and perfected over several lifetimes in the island highlands of Arktura, now wielded with precision accuracy against his enemies. Zharvakko can be your best friend or your worst enemy--healing allies and laying waste to all who oppose him.
hype_loc: Witch Doctor is whatever his team needs him to be. Whether aiding his team with gradual healing, stunning and cursing foes to ensure a kill, or destroying enemies himself with a dance by his mighty ultimate, few can match Witch Doctor's versatility.
npe_desc_loc: Channels a high damage death ward

facets.description_loc: Paralyzing Cask deals more damage each bounce.
facets.name: witch_doctor_headhunter

facets.description_loc: Voodoo Restoration deals damage to enemies. No longer heals.
facets.name: witch_doctor_voodoo_festeration

facets.description_loc: Death Ward attacks multiple targets with reduced damage.
facets.name: witch_doctor_cleft_death

abilities.name: witch_doctor_paralyzing_cask
abilities.desc_loc: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits. Deals %creep_damage_pct%%% damage to creeps.
abilities.lore_loc: The Witch Doctor recycles the bones of fallen friends and foes, using the powder as part of his arsenal of charms and alchemy.
notes_loc: Targets can be hit multiple times, as long as another unit is struck in between the bounces.
facets_loc: Paralyzing Cask deals more damage each bounce.

abilities.name: witch_doctor_voodoo_restoration
abilities.desc_loc: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units, costing Witch Doctor mana every second Voodoo Restoration is active.
abilities.lore_loc: Zharvakko's hocus pocus is not limited only to hexxing his opponents and is quite adept at curing ailments.
notes_loc: Healing is done in %heal_interval% second intervals.
Voodoo Festeration damage values are equal to the heal value.
facets_loc: Voodoo Restoration deals damage to enemies and only heals Witch Doctor.

abilities.name: witch_doctor_maledict
abilities.desc_loc: Curses all enemy Heroes in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.
abilities.lore_loc: Certain voodoo magics can make an enemy regret engaging the Witch Doctor.
notes_loc: If an affected hero's health has increased above the amount they had when Maledict was cast, the burst damage will be 0.

abilities.name: witch_doctor_voodoo_switcheroo
abilities.desc_loc: Turns Witch Doctor into a Death Ward briefly with reduced attack speed. He is hidden during this time.

abilities.name: witch_doctor_gris_gris
abilities.desc_loc:
Witch Doctor gets a Gris-Gris, an item that cannot be dropped or placed in the backpack. When the owner dies, %death_gold_lost_reduction_pct_tooltip%%% of the gold lost from death is added to the item, and will be refunded when the item is consumed. The value of the Gris-Gris is increased by 1 every %gold_tick_interval_tooltip%s.

Right-click to consume and permanently remove the item.

abilities.name: witch_doctor_death_ward
abilities.desc_loc: CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes within its attack range. Lasts a maximum of %abilitychanneltime% seconds. Death Ward has %bonus_accuracy%%% bonus accuracy.
abilities.lore_loc: Witch Doctor performs a ritualistic dance, one that haunts the dreams of those who live to recount it.
notes_loc: The Death Ward is invulnerable, and is only destroyed if Witch Doctor is interrupted or its duration expires.
The Death Ward can be controlled, and made to attack a specific target.
Death Ward attacks once every 0.22 seconds.
abilities.scepter_loc: Death Ward attacks bounce between nearby enemies.
facets_loc: Death Ward attacks %initial_target_count% targets at once with reduced damage.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_witch_doctor_2
talents.name_loc: +{s:value}% Target Max Health Voodoo Restoration Heal
facets_loc: +{s:value}% Target Max Health Voodoo Restoration Damage
